title: If i file bankruptcy will it allow me to get my vehicle out of impound?
question: Had bad registration, was pulled over car impounded i had a warrant. So basically its so expensive, im experiencing a financial hardship so I was already thinking about filling bankruptcy before. I need a car to work, its very frustrating. If not is there any other options?
answers: Filing bankruptcy is not going to get your car back. And every day the impound is charging you a daily storage rate. You need to get the warrant and the registration resolved, and then pay the impound fees. Bankruptcy just won't help you with any of that.
